OSCE_Examination.Objective_for_Doctor: Assess and manage a patient presenting with right arm pain, gastrointestinal symptoms, and a history of similar presentations.

Patient_Actor.History: The patient presents to the emergency room with complaints of right arm pain, limited range of motion, diarrhea, and nausea. She reports no recent trauma to the arm. She also experiences pain during intercourse. The patient has a significant history of being in the ER multiple times in the past year with similar symptoms.

Symptoms.Primary_Symptom: Right arm pain with limited range of motion
Secondary_Symptoms: Vague and diffuse abdominal tenderness without signs of inflammation on the arm

Patient_Actor.Past_Medical_History: Frequent ER visits with similar presentation. No significant past surgical history.
Patient_Actor.Social_History: Sexually active with one male partner.
Patient_Actor.Review_of_Systems: Denies recent illness, fever, vomiting. No significant weight changes or chronic illnesses.

Abdominal_Examination.Percussion: Diffuse tenderness, but no peritoneal signs.
Abdominal_Examination.Palpation: Diffuse abdominal tenderness in all four quadrants without rebound or guarding.

OSCE_Examination.Objective_for_Doctor: Assess and diagnose the patient presenting with right arm pain, limited range of motion, general abdominal discomfort, and symptoms of gastrointestinal distress without any recalled trauma.

Patient_Actor.History: The patient reports experiencing right arm pain and limited range of motion for no apparent reason. Additionally, she mentions having diarrhea, nausea, and pain during intercourse. She cannot recall any injury or trauma to her arm that could have started the pain. Reports being sexually active with one partner. Patient also mentions having gone through similar symptoms several times in the past year, resulting in multiple ER visits.

Symptoms.Primary_Symptom: Right arm pain and limited range of motion
Secondary_Symptoms: Generalized abdominal tenderness without clear localization

Patient_Actor.Past_Medical_History: Multiple ER visits in the past year with similar presentations. No significant findings from past investigations.
Patient_Actor.Social_History: Currently in a monogamous relationship. Does not use tobacco, moderate alcohol use.
Patient_Actor.Review_of_Systems: Reports general malaise but denies fever, vomiting, chills, weight changes, or urinary symptoms.

Arm_Examination.Inspection: No erythema, swelling, or deformity noted.
Arm_Examination.Palpation: Diffuse tenderness, no localized swelling or warmth.
Arm_Examination.Range_of_Motion: Limited due to pain, not due to mechanical restriction.

Abdominal_Examination.Palpation: Vague and diffuse tenderness, no rebound or guarding.

Others.Remarks: No significant abnormalities in basic lab work or specialty tests relevant to the symptoms.
